annotations:
-------------------------------------------
ULTRABULK ASIA / AUSTRALIA SMAX CARGO / TONNAGE UPDATE
-------------------------------------------
PLEASE PROPOSE SUITABLE RATED BUSINESS FOR OUR LATEST TONNAGE:
MV VAN HUI                 63,876 DWT                   OPEN TOKUYAMA                    O/A 25-27 AUG       (REF: CECILIA + PETER + JON + KLAUS)
ABT 630-680mt VLSFO / ABT 250-300mt LSMGO
LAST FIVE: COAL/GRAINS/IRON ORE/IRON ORE/FERTS
2X25MT 1/3/5; 2X20MT 2/4; NO DECK
++++++++++++++++++++
MV VAN HUI
BUILT 2023
SINGAPORE FLAG
DWT 63876 MTS ON ABT 13.50 M SWD
LOA: 199,90 M
BEAM: 32,26 M
GRT/NRT: ABT 35906/ABT 21206
DEPTH MOULDED: 18.90M
CLASS: LR
CRANE: 4 X 30 MTS  IN HOOK MODE, 24 MTS IN GRAB MODE
GRAB: 4 X 12 CBM GRAB
CARGO HOLD (GRAIN, INCLUDING HATCH COAMINGS) ABT. 78,300 M3
SPEED / CONSUMPTION:
LADEN : ABT 13.50 KTS ON ABT 23.00 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1 MT LSMGO
BALLAST : ABT 14.00 KTS ON ABT 22.00 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1 MT LSMGO
ECO SPEED FOR REFER ONLY WOG
LADEN : ABT 12.50 KNOTS ON ABT 20.00 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1 MT MGO
BALLAST : ABT 12.50 KNOTS ON ABT 17.00 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1 MT MGO
PORT IDLE : ABT 3.0 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1 MT LSMGO
PORT WORKING: ABT 6 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1 MT LSMGO
SPEED/CONSUMPTION BASED ON GOOD WEATHER CONDITION UPTO BEAUFORT SCALE 4  AND/OR DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (COMBINED SEA/SWELL/ MAXIMUM SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT OF 1.25 M) NO DECK CARGO, NO ADVERSE DAILY CURRENT AND/OR NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL AND ALWAYS LOADED NOT MORE THAN VESSEL'S  MAX SUMMER LOADLINE,
AND ALWAYS EXCLUDING VOYAGES LESS THAN 48 HOURS TRANSIT TIME FROM SEA PILOT TO SEA PILOT, PASSAGES WITH RESTRICTED VISIBILITY, CONGESTED WATERS, STRAITS, NARROWED WATERS AND WHILE MANEUVERING, ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS.
IN CASE OF HOT/COLD CLIMATES AN ADDITIONAL 1MT DAILY CONSUMPTION IS EXPECTED FOR MACHINERY COOLING, AND FUEL HEATING DEMANDS.
PERIODS OF LESS THAN 24 HOURS, FROM NOON REPORT TO NOON REPORT, OF CONTINUOUS GOOD WEATHER TO BE EXPRESSLY EXCLUDED FROM DETERMINATION OF THE VESSEL'S PERFORMANCE.  UNLESS OTHERWISE AGREED BY OWNERS
BUT AGREEMENT NOT TO BE UNREASONABLY WİTHHELD, CHARTERERS MAY NOT DEDUCT OR SET-OFF AMOUNTS FROM HIRE PAYMENTS FOR SPEED AND/OR OVERCONSUMPTION CLAIMS. NO EXTRAPOLATIONS CAN BE MADE.
VESSEL HAS LIBERTY TO CONSUME DIESEL OIL WHEN MANEUVERING, IN/OUT PORTS, STARTING OF A/E, IN THE BOLIER DURING PORT STAY, BURNING OF SLUDGE OIL IN INCINERATOR, NAVIGATING IN SHALLOW/RESTRICTED/BUSY/CONGESTED
WATERS/CANALS/RIVERS/DURING PILOTAGE OR FOR SAFETY OF VESSEL DURING BAD WEATHER/FOG, ALWAYS UNDER DISCRETION OF THE MASTER.
-BUNKER QUALITY:
VLSFO 380 CST: RMG 380 AS PER ISO 8217:2017  OR, IF UNAVAILABLE, ISO 8217:2010 (MAX SULPHUR CONTENT: 0.5% PCT)
LSMGO: DMA ISO 8217:2017-E OR, IF UNAVAILABLE, ISO 8217:2010 (MAX SULPHUR CONTENT : 0.1% )
BOTH GRADES ALWAYS TO COMPLY WITH MARPOL 73/78 REQUIREMENTS, REG 14, 18 OF ANNEX VI AND ANY SUBSEQUENT AMENDMENTS THERETO.
OWNERS ARE DELIVERING THE VESSEL TO CHARTERERS WITH VLSFO (380CST) AND LSMGO.
THE VESSEL HAS PBCF (PROPELLER BUSS CAP FIN).
ALL DETAILS ARE ABOUT
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
